summary: Removes the long animation for mining. Instead you can tap at it 3 times.
descriptionHtml:
==================================================================
= DFB - Disabled Mining Anim
==================================================================

Author: Darkfirebird

==========
=Overview=
==========
-Removes the long animation for mining. Instead you can tap at it 3 times.

===============
= Description =
===============
-This mod changes the script for the Mining by changing out the animation sequence to just allow ya to tap at it.
Really did not like standing there and usually bugging on some veins. So changed it to be quicker and more interesting.

Changes: Just the animation to nothing by changing the calls. ( Tap 3 times to use it all. )

Enjoy this small edit.

================
= Installation =
================
Copy Scripts/MineOreScript.pex to your Data/Scripts folder.

To uninstall, delete MineOreScript.pex.

=========
= Notes =
=========
-Ignores NPCs if they are using it. Not a really big bug, but still a note.

=================
=Version History=
=================
=Version 1.0=
+Initial Release
author: Darkfirebird
